item.title: Currently a line of thunderstorms is moving into the Norther
item.description: Currently a line of thunderstorms is moving into the Northern parts of Mercer County. Impacts could include Wind gusts of 40 mph, deadly cloud to ground lightning and hail up to 1/2 inch in size. These storms could become stronger as they move from north to south.
